Lines.Speech: [i]Creeping up to the spider, you reach it as it readies to stab the cocoon. Shoving it away with your - Glados' - super strength, you unwrap Yuu.

Lines.Speaker: GLADOS
Lines.Speech: Ugh, I can't deal with her. Muting external sound for myself, your hearing is all yours, Boss.

Lines.Speaker: Yuu
Lines.Speech: Oh my gosh that was sooo horrible. _Thanks Scull for the assist! I just wanna get out of here already.

Lines.Speaker: Agent Scully
Lines.Speech: First of all, it's Scully, not Scull. Second, we still need to deal with that.
[i]You point and Yuu turns in that direction to see an audibly angry giant spider racing towards the both of you.
